alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Southern Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fairfield and southwestern Lancaster Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Great Falls, or 12 miles north of Springdale, moving northeast at 10 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Wateree Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Springdale, Irwin, Fishing Creek Reservoir, Bell Town Fire Station, Mitford, Faith Christian School, McDonald Green Elementary School, and Lancaster Mill. This includes Interstate 77 between mile markers 45 and 50. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
